entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 25 December 2022
